com.octo.android.robodemo
Class DrawView

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      com.octo.android.robodemo.DrawView
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback
public class DrawView
extends android.view.View

This view will draw all LabeledPoint on its surface. It uses a DrawViewAdapter to get the content to draw.

Author:
sni

setShowingAllPointsAtTheEndOfAnimation

public void setShowingAllPointsAtTheEndOfAnimation(boolean isShowingAllPointsAtTheEndOfAnimation)
Wether or not all points are displayed at the end of all points animation.

Parameters:
isShowingAllPointsAtTheEndOfAnimation - if true, all points will be visible at the end of animation, nothing will be displayed otherwise.

setDrawingOnePointAtATime

public void setDrawingOnePointAtATime(boolean isDrawingOnePointAtATime)
Whether to show one point at a time or a point and all previous points.

Parameters:
isDrawingOnePointAtATime - if true, only one point will be displayed at a time. If false, a point and all its predecessors will be displayed simultaneously.

isDrawingOnePointAtATime

public boolean isDrawingOnePointAtATime()

protected void drawPoint(int position,
                         android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
Draw the point at the position specified by DrawViewAdapter#getTextPoint(int)

Parameters:
position - the index of the point to draw.
canvas - the canvas on which to draw the point at position.

drawText

protected void drawText(int position,
                        android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
Draw the text of the point at a given position specified by DrawViewAdapter#getTextPoint(int)

Parameters:
position - the index of the point to draw.
canvas - the canvas on which to draw the point at position.

doDrawUnderTextPaint

protected void doDrawUnderTextPaint(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                                    android.text.Layout layout)
Draw some surface under text. This method is called just before drawing each LabeledPoint's text.

Parameters:
canvas - the canvas in which we draw.
layout - the Layout associated to a LabeledPoint.

drawDrawable

protected void drawDrawable(int position,
                            android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
Draw the drawable of the point at a given position specified by DrawViewAdapter#getDrawablePoint(int)

Parameters:
position - the index of the point to draw.
canvas - the canvas on which to draw the point at position.

doUseClearPorterDuffXfermode

protected void doUseClearPorterDuffXfermode(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                                            android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
if PorterDuff xfermode is active, this method can be used to remove the background inside the Drawable associated to a LabeledPoint. This method is called just before drawing each LabeledPoint's drawable.

Parameters:
canvas - the canvas on which to draw the point at position.
drawable - the Drawable that is going to be drawn.
See Also:
isClearPorterDuffXfermodeEnabled, setIsClearPorterDuffXfermodeEnabled(boolean)
